On 9/1/06, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...> wrote:
>  I have never on any project ever tested whether close() closes a
>  database connection. By a show of hands, how many people have tested that?

Let's not forget that in most J2EE settings, we don't want the
physical database connection to be closed when we call "close()" on
the Connection object (think DataSources and connection pooling).

-Lasse-
